instructions: Would you please read this ad as you normally would and then I'll ask you to close the magazine.

question_7c.text: What ideas or impressions about the product did you get from this ad?

question_8c.text: Please read to me all the words or phrases that came to mind when you saw this ad.

question_9c.text: Which length or lengths of cigarettes was being advertised?
options: King size and Super Long size

notice: If the film image is less clear than this notice, it is due to the quality of the document filmed.
